body.name: OVENTE Electric Countertop Single Burner, 1000W Cooktop with 7.25 Inch Cast Iron Hot Plate, 5 Level Temperature Control, Compact Cooking Stove and Easy to Clean Stainless Steel Base, Silver BGS101S

features: EFFICIENT POWER – This single burner is equipped with a 7.25” cast-iron plate and powered by 1000 watts (120V). It heats up quickly and cooks food evenly. Suitable for frying, keeping food warm, boiling hot water or soup.

ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL – Turn the control knob from low, medium or high setting depending on your need. Features an indicator light on the front that will illuminate red to remind users the cooktop is warming or heating and will auto shut off in the event of overheating or if the desired temperature is reached.

SAFE & HEAVY-DUTY – Made with durable stainless steel housing that is resistant to high temperatures and fire for your safety. It won’t easily warp, rust or bend even after years of usage. Has non-slip rubber feet to ensure it remains stable during use.

ULTIMATE SPACE SAVER – This burner is just the right size for studio apartment, college dorm, RV and homes with small space. Storage won't be an issue, just store it on your cabinet or under your counter and take it out whenever an extra cooking device is needed. Because it is lightweight and handy, you can even bring it along on weekend camping trips.
EASY TO CLEAN – You do not need to scrub off food drippings and oil splatters from the unit. Simply wipe the non-electrical parts with a damp sponge or disinfectant kitchen wipe and pat dry.

US-BASED CUSTOMER SERVICE LETS YOU BUY WITH CONFIDENCE – OVENTE warranties that the product shall be free from defects in material and workmanship under normal use and conditions, for 1 year from the original purchase date.
body.description: Experience instant and faster cooking time with the OVENTE Electric Single Burner. This portable hotplate offers reliable heating and takes up minimal space. A powerful home appliance built with 1000 wattage that can boil a full pot of stew real fast and heats up any type of pan or cookware easily. Plus it keeps the heat constant according to your desired temperature. Cleaning the nonstick cast iron plate is easy, simply wipe it with a clean, damp cloth. Perfect when you need an extra heat source for holiday cooking and entertaining guests for any house party or occasion. Works great as a gift for students and young adults living on their own, people with small spaces or caravans and you can take it with you when you travel for outings, camping trips or boat rides. Great for everyday use, convenient and easy to operate.

TEMPERATURE CONTROL Simply turn the control knob to your desired temperature and adjust the setting when needed. COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT Perfect for studio apartments, offices, and RVs. You can even bring it along on vacation!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works good
reviews.reviewText: My stove broke and this little thing saved me. It's simple to use, sturdy, great size. I've been using it for 10 days with no problem. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a life saver!Very modern design, light weight, and fits in small spaces.Works better than an old stove which takes a long time to heat up and boil water.Although these burners work too well! You have to be careful with the temperature because it does heat up fast and it’s super hot.I actually had to turn it off and unplug it because it kept heating my food too much even at low heat.But that’s not a problem, I love my burners. They’re a great and useful purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality cast iron hot plate.
reviews.reviewText: The cast iron plate to me is better than the spiral heating element types. At my job, we occasionally get new 1 gallon cans of epoxy where the epoxy is almost as thick as clay. We use the burner to heat the gallon cans to liquefy the epoxy before mixing with hardener. The cans have a tendency to jiggle on top of the spiral heating element type burner. The cast iron plate is solid and does not have any movement which will be better for 1 gallon cans of epoxy.I tested the burner on heat setting number 2 to liquefy a jar of solidified coconut oil. It only took about 15 minutes on low heat to do so.This burner was not purchased to cook with so I cannot vouch for its cooking abilities. Some people claim it takes a while to heat up. I will soon find out when it is used to heat cans of solidified epoxy. I am not worried about slow heat and slow cool down cycles. The burner stays stationary in an area away from any potential combustible objects and is left to cool down after heating a can of epoxy that needs to be liquefied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This two burner hot plate is great. The cast iron burner surface is far superior to glass in heating up to a consistent temperature. Great price for a very efficient, well made product. Don’t mess around, get this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, good range of temps, travels well
reviews.reviewText: We used this to cook at a camp ground, it is substantial enough to heat well and quickly, but not so heavy that I couldn’t move it. Two burners was great, allowed us to keep different stuff going at the same time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, practical and safe to use.
reviews.reviewText: The appliance gets so awfully hot all around, there seems no convenient nor quick way to move it when in use.I am now beginning to wonder if I should have purchased the induction type.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Excellent Hot Plate
reviews.reviewText: Attractive, stainless steel, easy to clean, good temperature control. My wife loved ours so much she bought 3 more to give as Christmas gifts. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great but a touch small
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this product because our oven broke and we didn’t want to replace it right away. This is working great for that, the burners are a little small and it does take a while to heat up fully but I feel like that’s reasonable. Overall great product
